author: The Associated Press
title: Seahawks-49ers Capsule
text:
By The Associated Press - Associated   
SANTA CLARA, Calif. (AP) - SEATTLE SEAHAWKS (2-4) at SAN FRANCISCO 49ERS (2-4) 
Thursday, 8:25 p.m. ET, NFLN/CBS 
OPENING LINE - Seahawks by 5 1/2 
RECORD VS. SPREAD - Seahawks 1-4-1, 49ers 3-3-0 
SERIES RECORD - Seahawks lead 18-15 
LAST MEETING - Seahawks beat 49ers 17-7, Dec. 14, 2014 
LAST WEEK - Seahawks lost to Panthers 27-23; 49ers beat Ravens 25-20 
AP PRO32 RANKING - Seahawks No. 15, 49ers No. 23 
SEAHAWKS OFFENSE - OVERALL (15), RUSH (2), PASS (27). 
SEAHAWKS DEFENSE - OVERALL (4), RUSH (13), PASS (5). 
49ERS OFFENSE - OVERALL (30), RUSH (12), PASS (29). 
49ERS DEFENSE - OVERALL (31), RUSH (15), PASS (32). 
STREAKS, STATS AND NOTES - Seahawks have won three straight and five of six in rivalry, including playoffs, and swept last season’s two meetings. … Seattle looks to improve 14-2 prime-time record since 2010 under Pete Carroll, having outscored opponents 397-191. Team’s third prime-time game of year and first of two road games ahead of bye week. Seahawks lost on Sunday night at Green Bay on Sept. 20 and before that last loss in prime time came at San Francisco on Thursday night, Oct. 18, 2012. … Seahawks 13-8 in last 21 road games dating to 2012. … Seattle has led in fourth quarter all six games this year - outscored 61-27 in fourth quarter and overtime, 40-3 in past three games. … Seahawks CB Richard Sherman has 24 career interceptions and needs one to reach 10th place for most picks during player’s first five seasons since 1970. Sunday marks his 71st game. … In last year’s second meeting, 49ers had 178 total yards in first half after having 164 for entire game in their first meeting. … QB Colin Kaepernick 1-5 in six starts vs. Seattle including playoffs, with three TDs, nine interceptions, 18 sacks, a 53.3 percent completion rate and 54.1 percent passer rating. Against everybody else, including in postseason, he’s 30-15, completing 60.9 percent of throws for 60 touchdowns to 22 picks, with 94.0 quarterback rating. … WR Anquan Boldin has two straight games with 100 yards receiving and tries to become first 49ers player with three straight since Hall of Famer Jerry Rice in Weeks 15-17 in 1995. … Fantasy Tip: 49ers TE Vernon Davis hasn’t had catch since making five receptions in Week 2 at Pittsburgh, missing two games with knee injury before returning against Baltimore. Will he score his first touchdown of season? 
___
